Attributes.description: Evolutionary causes, consequences and constraints of human cognition; enhanced encephalization and mentalizing capabilities throughout the Primate Order, and the emergence of cognitive faculties that define the human species.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Third-year or higher standing in the Faculty of Science.)
